testcase.classname: As a user, I want to access the list of loans via API connection.
testcase.name: When a valid GET request is sent to the 'user/list/loan' endpoint with the appropriate
testcase.system-out: Given The API user sets "user/list/loan" path parameters....................passed And The API user saves the response returned from the user list loan endpoint.passed Then The API user verifies that the status code is 200......................passed And The API user verifies that the remark information in the response body is "success".passed
